name: Automatum
description: Automatum is a 2D action and platform game with a dark pixel art style,in wich we take the role of an alien that must face a lot of adversities like platforming, combat and puzzles so he can regain his precious freedom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 32 bits Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
